channel.title: Server Help: How do i switch my home?
channel.description: Hello, my server source that we edited alot, We just cant find how to switch the home. Its like at the lumber mill, but how can i make it so its like somewere else.

item.title: Server Help: How do i switch my home?
item.dc:creator: @blender blender
item.description:
@blender wrote:

you can go into client.java and push crtl+f and type home. Once you find the command “::home”, look down on the code until you find the X: and Y: (tele coords) and change them to your new area (you got to have the coordinates). Next compile your server. Now when people type ::home or click home on player controls, they will spawn to your new location. You might have to change the coords for the new home again in client.java or in player.java

Read full topic
item.source: Server Help: How do i switch my home?
